target_caption: Table 16: Image classification accuracies on unbiased test sets of BFFHQ and BAR with varying ratios of bias-conflicting samples.The cross and check represent whether each model 1) uses bias labels during training and 2) requires predefined bias type.For LfF and DisEnt, the performance gains are shaded in grey.Best performing results are marked in bold.
source_title: Learning Debiased Representation via Disentangled Feature Augmentation
